    • Method Detail

      • connectionStringBuilder

        public void connectionStringBuilder(java.lang.String pathToServer,
                           java.lang.String DBName,
                           java.lang.String userName,
                           java.lang.String password)
        builds a DB connection String with the given parameters. ? breaks/ ends the path and starts sending information to Server. & add specific information to be sent to Server
        Parameters:
        pathToServer - - self explanitory
        DBName - - name of the Database
        userName - - your username on the DB you are trying to access
        password - - your password to grant you access to the DB
